1. Wake up every morning, saying, "this is going to be the best day of my life", and it will be!
2. The moment you realize you are responsible for every aspect of your life is when you are completly free.
3. You don't have to be in a relationship to be happy. You just have to love and understand yourself.
4. To love yourself, simply be the genuine you.
5. Life is in a constant flux. Savor the moments you enjoy and know that those you don't will pass.
6. The self is always changing. What matters is how you create the self you wish to be every moment!
7. We only have so much time, its okay to cut off things that are unnecessary.
